title: 2 Set 15.7'' Gold Circle Mirrors Wall Decor Iron Frame Mirrors Art Round Home Hanging Mirrors for Living Room/Bedroom/Bathroom/Entryway (Medium Size 15.7 inch)
descriptions:
### 2 Set 15.7" Gold Circle Mirrors Wall Decor

**Elevate Your Space with Modern and Artistic Elegance**

#### Product Description:
Enhance the aesthetic appeal of your home with the 2 Set 15.7" Gold Circle Mirrors Wall Decor. Designed with a modern and artistic touch, these mirrors feature a unique "circle on circles" design, adding a touch of sophistication and style to any room. Whether you're looking to create a focal point in your living room, add a bit of glamour to your bedroom, or simply refresh your bathroom, these mirrors are the perfect addition to your home decor.

#### Key Features:
- **Design**: Circle on circles, providing a contemporary and visually appealing look.
- **Set Includes**: 2 mirrors, allowing for versatile arrangement and styling.
- **Size**: Each mirror has a diameter of 15.7 inches with the frame, and the mirror itself measures 10 inches in diameter.
- **Frame Material**: Durable iron frame in a gold finish that strikes a balance between matte and bright, ensuring a timeless look.
- **Installation**: Easy to hang with a single screw, making setup a breeze.
- **Weight**: Each mirror weighs 2 pounds, ensuring they are lightweight and easy to handle.
- **Glass Quality**: High-quality annealed glass with HD imaging, preventing warping and distortion for a clear and sharp reflection.
- **Versatility**: Matches various decor styles and can be styled independently or combined with other wall art, paintings, wall sculptures, or candle sconces.
- **Suitable Locations**: Ideal for living rooms, bedrooms, bathrooms, entryways, and office spaces.
- **Package**: Comes in a decent package to ensure safe delivery.

#### Why Choose Our 2 Set 15.7" Gold Circle Mirrors Wall Decor:
- **Modern and Artistic**: The "circle on circles" design adds a unique and modern touch to any space.
- **High-Quality Materials**: Made with high-quality annealed glass and a durable iron frame, these mirrors are built to last.
- **Easy Installation**: Quick and easy to hang, requiring just one screw for each mirror.
- **Versatile Styling**: Can be styled independently or combined with other wall art to create a personalized look.
- **Perfect for Multiple Rooms**: Suitable for a variety of spaces, from living rooms to bathrooms, these mirrors add a touch of elegance wherever you place them.

#### Customer Benefits:
- **Enhance Your Home**: Transform any room with the modern and artistic design of these gold circle mirrors.
- **Easy to Use**: Simple installation process means you can start enjoying your new decor right away.
- **Versatile and Stylish**: Mix and match with other wall art to create a unique and personalized space.
- **Durable and Reliable**: High-quality materials ensure that these mirrors will look great for years to come.

#### Suitable Locations:
- Living Room
- Bedroom
- Bathroom
- Entryway
- Office Space

#### Combination Options:
- Picture Wall
- Above TV
- With Paintings
- Wall Sculpture
- Candle Sconces

Add a touch of modern elegance to your home with the 2 Set 15.7" Gold Circle Mirrors Wall Decor. Order yours today and transform your living space into a stylish and inviting environment!
